mapper.select: select tci.company_name, tci.company_color, tsi.service_name, tsi.service_color from tb_company_info tci join tb_service_info tsi on tci.company_id = tsi.company_id order by 1, 3;

select tci.company_name, tsi.service_name, tssi.service_web_url, tssi.service_os, tssi.service_was, tssi.service_db, tssi.service_mngr_tkcg, tssi.service_mngr_dept, tssi.service_mngr_name from tb_company_info tci join tb_service_info tsi on tci.company_id = tsi.company_id left join tb_service_system_info tssi on tsi.service_id = tssi.service_id where tsi.service_name = trim(#{name});

select tsi.service_name from tb_company_info tci join tb_service_info tsi on tci.company_id = tsi.company_id left join tb_service_target_mapping tstm on tsi.service_id = tstm.service_id left join tb_service_target_info tsti on tstm.target_id = tsti.target_id where tsti.target_name = trim(#{targetName});

select distinct tsi.service_name from tb_company_info tci join tb_service_info tsi on tci.company_id = tsi.company_id join tb_table_meta_info ttmi on tsi.service_id = ttmi.service_id join tb_main_category tmc on ttmi.main_category_id = tmc.main_category_id where tmc.main_category_name like concat('%', trim(#{keyword}), '%');
